verses.verse: Hear<WH8085> this<WH2088> word,<WH1697> you cows<WH6510> of Bashan,<WH1316> that are in the mountain<WH2022> of Samaria,<WH8111> which oppress<WH6231> the poor,<WH1800> which crush<WH7533> the needy,<WH34> which say<WH559> to their masters,<WH113> Bring,<WH935> and let us drink.<WH8354>

The Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> has sworn<WH7650> by his holiness,<WH6944> that, see,<WH2009> the days<WH3117> shall come<WH935> on you, that he will take<WH5375> you away with hooks,<WH6793> and your posterity<WH319> with fishhooks<WH5518> <WH1729>.
And you shall go<WH3318> out at the breaches,<WH6556> every<WH802> cow at that which is before<WH5048> her; and you shall cast<WH7993> them into the palace,<WH2038> said<WH5001> the LORD.<WH3068>

Come<WH935> to Bethel,<WH1008> and transgress;<WH6586> at Gilgal<WH1537> multiply<WH7235> transgression;<WH6586> and bring<WH935> your sacrifices<WH2077> every morning,<WH1242> and your tithes<WH4643> after three<WH7969> years:<WH3117>

And offer<WH6999> a sacrifice of thanksgiving<WH8426> with leaven,<WH2557> and proclaim<WH7121> and publish<WH8085> the free<WH5071> offerings: for this<WH3651> likes<WH157> you, O you children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> said<WH5001> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

And I also<WH1571> have given<WH5414> you cleanness<WH5356> of teeth<WH8127> in all<WH3605> your cities,<WH5892> and want<WH2640> of bread<WH3899> in all<WH3605> your places:<WH4725> yet have you not returned<WH7725> to me, said<WH5001> the LORD.<WH3068>

And also<WH1571> I have withheld<WH4513> the rain<WH1653> from you, when there were yet<WH5750> three<WH7969> months<WH2320> to the harvest:<WH7105> and I caused it to rain<WH4305> on one<WH259> city,<WH5892> and caused it not to rain<WH4305> on another<WH259> city:<WH5892> one<WH259> piece was rained<WH4305> on, and the piece whereupon<WH834> <WH5921> it rained<WH4305> not withered.<WH3001>

So two<WH8147> or three<WH7969> cities<WH5892> wandered<WH5128> to one<WH259> city,<WH5892> to drink<WH8354> water;<WH4325> but they were not satisfied:<WH7646> yet have you not returned<WH7725> to me, said<WH5001> the LORD.<WH3068>

I have smitten<WH5221> you with blasting<WH7711> and mildew:<WH3420> when your gardens<WH1593> and your vineyards<WH3754> and your fig<WH8384> trees and your olive<WH2132> trees increased,<WH7235> the palmerworm<WH1501> devoured<WH398> them: yet have you not returned<WH7725> to me, said<WH5001> the LORD.<WH3068>

I have sent<WH7971> among you the pestilence<WH1698> after the manner<WH1870> of Egypt:<WH4714> your young<WH970> men have I slain<WH2026> with the sword,<WH2719> and have taken<WH7628> away<WH7628> your horses;<WH5483> and I have made the stink<WH889> of your camps<WH4264> to come<WH5927> up to your nostrils:<WH639> yet have you not returned<WH7725> to me, said<WH5001> the LORD.<WH3068>

I have overthrown<WH2015> some of you, as God<WH430> overthrew<WH4114> Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah,<WH6017> and you were as a firebrand<WH181> plucked<WH5337> out of the burning:<WH8316> yet have you not returned<WH7725> to me, said<WH5001> the LORD.<WH3068>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> will I do<WH6213> to you, O Israel:<WH3478> and because<WH6118> <WH3588> I will do<WH6213> this<WH2063> to you, prepare<WH3559> to meet<WH7125> your God,<WH430> O Israel.<WH3478>

For, see,<WH2009> he that forms<WH3335> the mountains,<WH2022> and creates<WH1254> the wind,<WH7307> and declares<WH5046> to man<WH120> what<WH4100> is his thought,<WH7808> that makes<WH6213> the morning<WH7837> darkness,<WH5890> and treads<WH1869> on the high<WH1116> places of the earth,<WH776> The LORD,<WH3068> The God<WH430> of hosts,<WH6635> is his name.<WH8034>
